# userInfo

**Instance Property**

Any custom data or object that you want to associate with the template.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var userInfo: Any? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPTemplate/userInfo] to store additional information on the template that is useful in other areas of your app.
title: userInfo
